title: What functions does my TalkBand B2 support?
answer:
Your B2 supports the following functions: 

  Motion status detection (walking, running and so on) 

  Sleep statistics collection 

  Bluetooth calling 

  Connection to two smart phones 

  Calorie calculation 

  Exercise target setting 

  Activity reminders 

  Smart alarms 

  Remote control for smart phone camera(This feature currently supports only EMUI2.3 versions or later of HUAWEI phones 

  Time display 

  Finding the phone
